channel.title: Micros on Website of Fergus Fettes
channel.description: Recent content in Micros on Website of Fergus Fettes

item.title: x220 Experiments 1
item.description: I decided to learn a little more about computer hardware by upgrading my latop. I bought a second one for parts/testing. Quick specs (original): Purchase date: 2016 (second hand)

item.title: Alacritty and ASCII
item.description: I made my terminal play a film today. I will investigate further and write up some details. It’s some wizardry with alacritty, I assume it achieves gpu acceleration by pretending to be a screen and running all its content to the GPU.

item.title: First real microblog entry
item.description: Hello world! I’m continuing my slightly anachronistic (or preposterous) tour of Web publishing. I started with a threejs megaproject, and now I’ve travelled all the way back (via simple paperjs attempts) to a static http website.
